titles.title: A resolution honoring the American Culinary Federation and the National Restaurant Association for their contributions to American culinary art and for their support of the 1988 United States Culinary Team.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/12/1988--Introduced. Declares that the House of Representatives honors the American Culinary Federation and the National Restaurant Association for their contributions to American culinary art and for their support of the 1988 United States Culinary Team.
